metadata.title: CVE-2022-2534 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versionsstarting from 9.3 before 15.0.5, all versions starting from 15.1 before15.1.4, all versions starting from 15.2 before 15.2.1. GitLab was returningcontributor emails due to improper data handling in the Datadogintegration.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
